description: I've worked as an individual contributor and team lead on a variety of web application projects across a number of industries, including a number of financial institutions, a national fast-casual sandwich chain, and a large federal government program.
Responsible for mobile front-end development of e-commerce platform.

Technology consultant at Slalom in the Portland, OR market. During this time, I worked on a number of UI projects using both Salesforce and modern web technologies for a number of high profile clients, including an athletic footwear and apparal corporation near Beaverton, OR, and a multinational e-commerce and cloud computing company in Seattle, WA.
Worked on an assessment application to facilitate easy test creation and management.  Technologies used include HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Ember.js, qUnit, Jenkins, Travis CI.
